text_block_list.text: On the day of the Selection Race ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Lotus root balanced by spinach… 
Lotus root balanced by spinach…
choice_data_list: What's that, some sort of incantation…?
What's that, some sort of incantation…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It is in fact a good luck charm! I find it is absolutely superb 
for focusing the mind and drawing out latent potential!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I have trained more than enough! Regardless of the outcome, 
I shall demonstrate my running prowess so that you take me in!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy, Fukukitaru～! How're ya doing?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'll be watching from the stands this time…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oooh! Taiki, Suzuka! Have you come to support me?! 
Thank you, I feel so much calmer now!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I have gone through a lot in the past few days, but thanks 
to that, I'm feeling downright fantastic and fully prepared!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
You got this! I just know you're gonna put on a great race! 
Me and Suzuka here are gonna follow you into debuting 
soon enough!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'll be there waiting for you in the Twinkle Series～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The start is getting close now… Alrighty then, friends, 
I'm going to run my heart out. Wish me good losing!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay! Good… huh, ehh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Count on me!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Umm… did she just say "losing"…? Ehh?

So, after everything that transpired, it was 
finally time for Matikanefukukitaru's race.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
No doubt everyone's had their eyes on this race since seeing 
the extraordinary horsegirls on the entry list… and off they go!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Matikanefukukitaru is slipping further and further backwards. 
Is she having trouble keeping up with the leaders?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Khhhhhhh～～ They're all so fast…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: But all I am required to do in this race is run my heart out!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Here I goooo～～! To fortuuuune!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: They're all starting their spurts as they turn the final corner!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Is that Matikanefukukitaru suddenly showing tremendous pace 
from the back of the field?! Can she make a comeback here?!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Wooooaaaaaaaaaaah!!!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhah～ For a moment I thought I could take the lead, but I couldn't catch up and finished last～

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That's right, it was really close. I think you would have 
overtaken them all at once if the line was 50 m further.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Absolutely! You might've been last, but you 
made the biggest impact for sure!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aww cut it out, friends, it wasn't that close～

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are! Matikanefukukitaru, if you'll allow me, 
I'd love to work with you as your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh……? With me?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Dearie, I haven't seen many cover ground at the end like that! 
Would you like to come and aim for glory with me?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Never mind them, if anyone will lead you to glory, it'll be me! 
Please team up with me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Awawawawa…!? I didn't expect so many trainers to call out to me after finishing last…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I must disappoint you, however, for I have 
already found my predestined one!
She looked my way as she said that.

I'm reminded of how, for all she loves fortune-telling 
and all the support she's found in it, this curious little 
horsegirl also still loves to run.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Umm, Trainer… If you leave me hanging any longer, I believe 
I might start regurgitating fortunes out of nervousness……
choice_data_list: Let's go chase our luck together!
Let's go chase our luck together!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ooooooh!! I've been waiting to hear you say that! Our time together is one I certainly look forward to!!
This was how I officially became Matikanefukukitaru's trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Let's go, I'm excited as can be to start training!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, but one thing before we start, if you please.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Today's carrot reading said running against a partner would 
lead to improved fortune, see, but as luck would have it, 
Suzuka wasn't available…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: That being the case, I thought you could run with me, Trainer!
choice_data_list: You think I can keep up with a horsegirl?!
You think I can keep up with a horsegirl?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Nothing to worry about! I'll drag you along if need be! 
Let's goo～!

We truly are at the mercy of fate, and today 
that fate dictated I should race a horsegirl.
